metadata.title: CVE-2021-3405 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in libebml before 1.4.2. A heap overflow bug exists in theimplementation of EbmlString::ReadData and EbmlUnicodeString::ReadData inlibebml.

criterions.comment: libebml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
